snippet: The authorities cited insufficient evidence supporting one of the sexual abuse claims that cost Bernie Fine, an assistant basketball coach at Syracuse, his job.
abstract: Federal authorities drop their investigation into sexual abuse claims that cost Syracuse assistant basketball coach Bernie Fine his job, after finding no evidence to support claims that Fine molested a boy in 2002.
lead_paragraph: The authorities cited insufficient evidence supporting one of the sexual abuse claims that cost Bernie Fine, an assistant basketball coach at Syracuse, his job.

headline.seo: Sexual Abuse Case Against Ex-Syracuse Coach Bernie Fine Is Dropped
headline.main: Syracuse Sexual Abuse Case Is Dropped
headline.print_headline: Syracuse Sex Abuse Case Is Dropped
